data.message: it cracks me up when people claim musicians, athletes, actors etc don’t have any say in politics as if they’re not still regular people just like us living in the same country at the end of day 😂

replies.message: It cracks me up that people like you actually think that celebs, athletes, etc, should try to divide this country even more with their hateful rhetoric, and ideology. Their fans don't pay money to watch ball games, watch movies, watch concerts etc, in order to hear their political views, and hate speech. Their political opinions is not what draws fans. Unless, of course, it is sheep like you.

Lara Reed Cordell did i say anything about them having specific views and opinions? no i did not. if they want to express their views then so be it, and if someone doesn’t like it, no one is forcing them to watch/listen or to be a fan. call me a sheep all you want, it doesn’t mean a thing!

Trump is a reality television star, who through the dumbing down of the nation, became president. You are his fan. So the bar is lower than ever before. All standards have been decimated. The divider in chief sits in the Oval Office. Your narrative is ridiculous.
